body: Buy it for night shift, we tend to get left out lol. I am a nightshift RN in a level 1 trauma ED in New Orleans. Haven't been able to sleep the past 3 days with all this craziness. Hubs went hard on AMC and its been nervewracking with the utter bs that has transpired the past two days for retail trades. HOLD STRONG EVERYONE!

Pharmacy technician. What medications do you take at home? I see here you have Ligma-cillin 420mg, HOLD-peridol 6.9mg M/W/F, and diamond/zinc topical ointment for your hands? I see, thank for for confirming, I'll get this into the computer for the ED attending ASAP.
